00011 #define _RESOURCEMANAGER_H_
00012 #include <string>
00013 #include <list>
00014 #include <map>

00025 template <typename Resource>
00026 class ResourceManager {
00027 public:
00028     ResourceManager();
00029     virtual ~ResourceManager();
00030 
00033     int resourcesLoaded() const;
00034 
00043     void registerResource(const std::string &name, Resource *resource);
00044 
00048     Resource* getCachedResource(const std::string &name);
00049 
00050 protected:
00051     std::map<std::string, Resource*> _namedResources;
00052     std::list<Resource*> _unnamedResources;
00053 
00055     void clearResources();
00056 
00057 public:
00058     static void Test();
00059     static void TestResourceAddition();
00060     static void TestResourceRetrieval();
00061 };

00076 *        Revision 1.4  2007/05/01 06:24:34  bmw2863
00077 *        Moved filters to Viewports rather than cameras. This makes filtering far
00078 *        more transparent, removes a number of redundant activate/viewport calls
00079 *        that were being made, and sets things up for viewports that have multiple
00080 *        RenderSources.
00081 *
00082 *        In RenderContext I removed a number of functions that were no longer needed
00083 *        due to the afore mentioned changes to viewports and filters.
00084 *
00085 *        Also of note is that certain function calls no longer do "magic work".
00086 *        Setting the viewport no longer enables its target and enabling a
00087 *        framebuffer no longer sets the viewport.
00088 *
